title: BONUS: A World Where The NRA Is Soft On Guns
description: About two months after the coronavirus began spreading in the United States, groups of Americans began to protest the quarantine lockdown measures in their states.  At some of these anti-lockdown rallies reporters Lisa Hagen of WABE and Chris Haxel of KCUR discovered they weren't the spontaneous grassroots uprisings they purported to be. Rather, they were being organized by a group of three brothers: Aaron, Ben and Chris Dorr.

itunes:title: BONUS: A World Where The NRA Is Soft On Guns
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Discover a social media empire with an unapologetic vision of gun rights—generating millions of likes, follows, and dollars.
itunes:subtitle: Discover a social media empire with an unapologetic vision of gun rights—generating millions of likes, follows, and dollars.
